editeur.controller

Class Mediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • editeur.controller.Mediator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMediator, SubjectObserve

    public class Mediator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMediator
    The class Mediator implements IMediator. Handle the complicated communications beetween components as CareTaker, commands, observers, application and some shapes. Is also a singleton, so is accessible anywhere from the project. Simplify a lot the process, all high level operations are accessible from there, and everything is updated.

        public void MouseClickEvent(boolean fromToolbar,
                            int clickSide,
                            Point old,
                            Point to)
        Mouse click event: manage the current mouseEvent. Move the shape pointed by old point to to position. Else select the shapes contains in a rectangle from old to to position.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        clickSide - the click side
        old - the old position
        to - the to position

      • MouseClickEventAddTool

        public void MouseClickEventAddTool(boolean fromToolbar,
                                   int clickSide,
                                   Point old,
                                   Point to)
        Mouse click event for adding a tool ( a shape in the toolbar.) Simply clone and add the cloned shape at old position if exists and add it to the to position. Does nothing if from toolbar
        Specified by:
        MouseClickEventAddTool in interface IMediator
        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        clickSide - the click side
        old - the old position
        to - the to position
